sentences.en: "Well," he conceded, "I do sometimes mumble a bit."
sentences.cn: “嗯，”他承认道，“我有时候说话的确有点吐字不清。”

sentences.en: For goodness'sakes, Lucy Marian, speak up! I can't abide children who mumble.
sentences.cn: 乖乖! 露西?玛丽安, 讲大声一点! 我最讨厌小孩子说话咕咕哝哝的.

sentences.en: He bumped into someone and mumbled an apology.
sentences.cn: 他撞到一个人，咕哝着道了歉。

sentences.en: He could hear the low mumble of Navarro's voice.
sentences.cn: 他能听到纳瓦罗在小声咕哝。

sentences.en: I have heard people who read badly mumble to themselves.
sentences.cn: 我听到那些阅读能力很差的人在小声默读.
我听到了不连贯的低语声.

sentences.en: I must speak clearly and to the point. I must not talk too fast or mumble.
sentences.cn: 只要说话,就该有重点,要说的舒畅,不要说的太快,也不要说的模糊不清.

sentences.en: If you mumble it looks like you don't know what to say!
sentences.cn: 如果你咕咕哝哝的话别人会以为你不知所云的.

sentences.en: Mumble can t sing , but he sure can dance!
Mumble: They could have eaten you.
sentences.cn: 它们本可以把你给吃了的.

sentences.en: Shave, use good grammar, be at least five minutes early, sit up straight. Don't mumble.
sentences.cn: 刮胡子, 应用好的语法, 早到五分钟, 坐直. 不要咕咕哝哝地说话.

sentences.en: Speak clearly and at a moderate pace. Do not shout or mumble.
sentences.cn: 用清晰温和的语调说话. 不要吼叫或喃喃自语.
特别是当嘴里还念着咒时,就更不用说了.

sentences.en: The two small primary schools have amalgamated because both the small mumble.
sentences.cn: 两所学校由于学生人数少,合并了.

sentences.en: This causes problems for a little penguin named Mumble.
sentences.cn: 这就引起小企鹅孟堡的麻烦.

words.tran_cn: 含糊地说；喃喃地说；困难地咀嚼（mumble的ing形式）

trans.tran_cn: 咕哝， 含糊不清地说
trans.tran_en: to say something too quietly or not clearly enough, so that other people cannot understand you
